headline: Amphenol (NYSE:APH) Announces Q2 2025 Dividend of US$0.165 Per Share
summary: Amphenol (NYSE:APH) experienced a significant 17% increase in its share price over the past month. The company's affirmation of its second-quarter dividend and strong first-quarter earnings, reporting a 48% increase in sales, likely supported this upward trend. Additionally, the approval of increased capital stock and a share buyback completion may have bolstered investor confidence. This gain coincided with broader market advances, as the S&P 500 and Dow Jones also rose amidst strong tech...

headline: Amphenol Announces Second Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: WALLINGFORD, Conn., May 01, 2025--Amphenol Corporation (NYSE: APH) announced today that its Board of Directors approved the second quarter 2025 dividend on its Common Stock in the amount of $0.165 per share at its meeting held on April 30, 2025. The Company will pay this second quarter 2025 dividend on July 9, 2025 to shareholders of record as of June 17, 2025.

raw.headline: Amphenol Announces Second Quarter 2025 Dividend

The Company will pay this second quarter 2025 dividend on July 9, 2025 to shareholders of record as of June 17, 2025.
